name: Loki's Nail [1]
description: The Katars consisting of two blades. It will cause the wounds that can not be healed and slowly bring the enemy to death.
effect: Doubles Critical,[Loki's Nail IX] ＋ [Windrunner Cape]: ＋5% [Cross Ripper Slasher] damage

description: The Katars consisting of two blades. It will cause the wounds that can not be healed and slowly bring the enemy to death.

name: Loki's Whispers
description: The illegitimate child of the Lord of Asgard once raised a mythical beast similar to Falcon. The arrogant mythical beast would hold up the green feathers beside its ears, whenever he saw the inferior human. The child was so disappointed by the pet and sighed its pervasive arrogance. He killed his pet with his own hands and kept the feathers beside its ears at the end, in order to prevent himself from being arrogant.

name: Loki's Whispers Blueprint
description: The illegitimate child of the Lord of Asgard once raised a mythical beast similar to Falcon. The arrogant mythical beast would hold up the green feathers beside its ears, whenever he saw the inferior human. The child was so disappointed by the pet and sighed its pervasive arrogance. He killed his pet with his own hands and kept the feathers beside its ears at the end, in order to prevent himself from being arrogant.

name: Long Bow
description: The damage is not very huge, but the bow is very convenient to use.

name: Long Horn [1]
description: A spear made by the horns of a sacred unicorn. It has the effect of detoxification. It will bleed non-stop when stabbed by the sharp tip.

name: Long Vacation Gashapon
description: A Gashapon toy to express personal feelings, open it to randomly receive one headwear of Oct 2017 [Long Vacation - Waltz] series.

description: A cursed spear filled with the blood of the saints. A spear used by a soldier named Longinus to kill saints.

name: Loots Chest
description: A box of mysterious trophies, pets are surrounding it with the babies' curiosity, only the owner has the right to open it.

name: Lord's Clothes
description: The legendary clothes worn by cunning merchants, with flickering sequins.
